verses.verse: Alleluia. Praise God in his sanctuary; praise him in the firmament of his power.[b]
Praise him for his awesome acts,[c] praise him for his immeasurable greatness.
[d]Praise him with the sound of the trumpet, praise him with the harp and lyre.
Praise him with tambourines and dancing, praise him with strings and flutes.
Praise him with clanging cymbals, praise him with crashing cymbals.
Let everything that breathes offer praise to the LORD. Alleluia.[e]
